content: {"id": "9a4e0d81-ce4b-4894-8ae1-0293036dffdd", "name": "The Saint Mary Food Pantry", "alternate_name": "", "description": "Visit stmarygr.org/stewardship/food-pantry/ | Distributions are scheduled on the first & third Mondays of each month from 5 to 7 p.m. and on the first & third Wednesdays of each month from 10 a.m. to 12 p.m. If a person needs food assistance when our food pantry is closed, please contact our parish office, tel. 616.459.7390, to see if we are able to assist you. The pantry is located in the corner of the parking lot at at 418 Second St. NW. Look for the brightly painted windows. A name and address are asked of everyone who comes for help.", "email": "parish@stmarygr.org", "url": "", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "", "address_2": "", "city": "", "state_province": "", "postal_code": "", "country": "US"}, "phones": [{"number": "(616)4597390", "type": "voice"}], "location": {"latitude": 42.9718945, "longitude": -85.67932789999999}, "regular_schedule": []}
